org.jointheleague.cards

Class Card

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jointheleague.cards.Card

  • public final class Card
extends java.lang.Object
    There are 4 suits (clubs, diamonds, hearts, and spades) and 13 cards in each suit (ace, 2 through 10, jack, queen, king). The number of a Card is an integer between 1 and 13, where 1 denotes an ace, 11 a jack, 12 a queen, and 13 a king. Cards are immutable; they cannot change after they are created. There may be multiple instances of Card with equal suit and number.

    This class has no public constructor. Use the getCard() methods of class Deck, to get an instance of Card.

    Author:
    Erik Colban
    See Also:
    Deck.getCard(), Deck.getCard(org.jointheleague.cards.Card.Suit, int)
